add_library(Pthread SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
#message("=========" ${MEDIAINFO_INCLUDE_DIR})
set_target_properties(Pthread PROPERTIES
        IMPORTED_LOCATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Bin/pthreadGC2.dll
        IMPORTED_LOCATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Bin/pthreadVC2.dll
        IMPORTED_IMPLIB ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Bin/pthreadVC2.lib
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)
